Codice sorgente per ingestion.env

import os
import sys

[documenti]def get_log_path(id):
    if not os.getenv("local_log"):
        if "win" in sys.platform:
            return f"c:/temp/{id}.log"
        else:
            return 	f"/tmp/{id}.log"
    else:
        return os.getenv("local_log")



[documenti]def get_log_handle_exception():
    if not os.getenv("log_handle"):
        if "win" in sys.platform:
            return "c:/temp/handle_exception.log"
        else:
            return 	"/tmp/handle_exception.log"
    else:
        return os.getenv("log_handle")
